reviews.review: Закалка для настоящих мужиков.Узнаешь каике есть люди,как ноют школьники,узнаешь новые матные слова и молодёжный слэнг. Станешь анти-стрессовым человеком и научишься щимить всех кто тебя бесит.Советую всем играть в эту игру

its fun and all, until you meet the hackers

The best first person shooter ever. The ranked 5v5 mode is well balanced, very competitive and there are a lot of great maps to play on. If you like the game after trying the free mode, get the Prime Status Upgrade. Then you will have way less hackers and smurfs. There is a big trading community around weapon skins, however you can't buy gameplay advantages with real money.

The game only performs well on Windows since it can make use of DirectX. On macOS, I always get some weird lags even though the graphics card should be strong enough.

earlier years of CS have seen better days but the fact that many times over the game has multiple issues which valve seem to just ignore i have played this game after a year or 2 of not playing it at all hoping they would be able to fix the issues:
-No registration on hitboxes
-Sound clitches , ect

This game is not worth anyones time or effort at all,Do not buy you are wasting your money
Hackers and laggy servers as always ruins any expirience. Prime or non prime this game sucks and has no normal matchmaking.
Just a pure classic at this point, even if you get sick of comp you will find a new way to enjoy this game.
